The '[[Motor ship|MV]]Cougar Ace' is a Singapore-flagged roll-on/roll-off car
carrier vessel. The Cougar Ace was built by Kanasashi Co., of Toyohashi, Japan
and launched in June 1993. Specifications cite a length of 199m, draft of 9.72m,
beam of 32.26m and a maximum speed of . Her Gross Tonnage is 55,328. She is
owned by Mitsui O.S.K. Lines.

On May 4, 2005, Cougar Ace delivered 5,214 automobiles at the Fraser River
wharves in Richmond, British Columbia. This set a Canadian record for the most
vehicles offloaded from a single ship. {{cite web
| url = http://www.mol.co.jp/opensea/05_e0507ado.html title = Fraser Wharves
| Sets New Auto Delivery Record accessdate = 2006-08-01 date = 2005-05-04 work =
| Open Sea publisher = Mitsui O.S.K. Lines
}}
